msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso contains traces
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is badly damaged in the left side, especially along its numerous vertical folds. There is a kollesis in the middle of the document, which is regularly cut at the left and right. At top and bottom the papyrus is broken. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

div.ab: " [(Column) 12];Tybi 11:;Herakles, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, obols 28;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 12;;Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Aphrodisios, son of Anchophis, grandson of Petheus, mother Melanous, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Pakysis, son of Melanas, grandson of Pakysis, mother Taheuhemeros, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, drachmas 8;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, obols 28;;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis, obols 28;;Heraklas, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day, drachmas 64, obols 24;;(Tybi) 12 likewise:;Longinus alias Gemellus, fatherless, mother Taphois, drachmas 16;;Hermadion, slave of Isidoros alias Longinus, drachmas 16;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Phasis, grandson of Keras, mother Helena, obols 28;;Didymos, son of Satabous, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, drachmas 8;;Sarapion, son of Valerius, grandson of Sarapion, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 8;;Dioskoros, son of Aiaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia, drachmas 4;;Zenas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tapasion, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Herakles, grandson of Petheus, mother Didyme, drachmas 16;;Herakles, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 20;;12th year the same, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 16, ? copper drachmas;;in total for the day drachmas 144, obols 19 of which 12th year drachmas 20, obols 20;;(Tybi) 14 likewise:;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanemgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Phaesis, grandson of Mysthes, mother Aunchis, drachmas 8;;Anchorymphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorymphis, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Mysthes, son of Teberis, grandson of Sambathion, mother Isidora, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Satabous, grandfather of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 12;;Harsiesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Harsiesis, mother Thatres, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, drachmas 4;;Didymion, son of Petheus the older, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4. obols 28
